subject: Execution of ROBs- Design of superstructure.
text: HRrd4 <rcfy <TTHT gferarr"t TM Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (a 4avt, 43r @ar7 3r ToTHnT TArqq) T4 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India QA Extn: 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping; Road Transport and Highways) j-5 @ 6, 7r-10, ETM, # frth}-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/218/2007-Admn 2 5 .11.2008 POLICY MATTERS TECHNICAL [23/2008] (Decision taken on ROB division's file no NHAIIGM-ROBISR/2O07(pt )) Sub:: Execution of ROBs Design of superstructure: It has been observed that the ROBs are being planned with the cast-in-situ superstructure in some cases, The provision of this arrangement requires erection of heavy staging across the Railway track which further requires imposition of caution order for slowing down of the train: 2 In view of the need for expeditious completion of the ROB works, it has been decided that the ROBs should be planned preferably with pre cast superstructure with the provision of placing the same with the help of road crane side slewing: This arrangement will avoid the erection of heavy staging and further imposition of the caution order for the trains for a long period: The launching scheme of the superstructure should be suggested in the GAD itself by the consultant entrusted with preparation of feasibility DPR 251 (V.K: Sharnia) General Manager (Admh ) To' 1, All Members 2, AlI CGMsICVO 3, AlI GMsIDGMs/Managers 4 AlI PDs of PIUs/CMUs/SPVs to: 1. PS to Chairman 2. Librarian/Hindi Officer also to: 1. The Commissioner, Railway Safety, Southern Circle, 7, Seshadhri Road, Gandhi Nagar; Bangalore-9 2. Chief Bridge Engineer, All Railway Zones NMAL Copy Copy
